desc: Parkin & Gerrish is an online-only shop, specialising in Antique, Vintage and Second - hand (Estate) Engagement Rings and Fine Jewellery. Beautifully curated jewels from the Georgian, Victorian, Edwardian and Art Deco eras, as well as, Modern. Free UK Delivery and Free Worldwide Delivery over £99. Free Ring Sizing. Beautiful Sustainable Signature Packaging. Gift wrapped, tracked and Insured. Expert Customer Service. It was founded in 2021 by husband and wife duo, Oliver and Zuleika Gerrish BA (Hons) FGA DGA. Zuleika is a trained gemologist and jewellery historian. Parkin & Gerrish are very proud to be not just an eco-friendly British brand, but also a small family-run business. Everything has been personally hand-picked by them; from the jewellery itself to their sustainable signature packaging.
